verbose_text: The identification of the disialo ganglioside 9-O-acetyl GD3, considered as an oncofetal marker, has been achieved using a lectin derived from the crab Cancer antennarius that recognizes sialic acids which are O acetylated at both C4 and C9 positions and have been shown to be a biomarker in human melanoma [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: acetylated at both C4 and C9
